hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Use of Amazon Web Services

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Stay Inside and Play Prizes will be given to the team (up to 4) that comes up this best thing for us to do on a rainy day when we are stuck inside.
We spend to much time cooped up inside, so give us a reason to go play outdoors!
This prize is given to the team (up to 4) that comes up with the best hack that embodies April Fools Day.
I spend a lot of time sitting in airports, traffic, metro transit, and most of all in bathrooms. Your challenge is to keep me entertained! This can be anything that alleviates boredom!
This prize is for the best use of IoT. GE is giving away Echo Dots and Roku Premiere+.
$500 to the Best overall Anthem Challenge Team
Visiting and office or apartment as a guest is such a pain. You have to check in at security, call down someone to let you in, check out when you leave and more.
Best Project that Adheres to slogan “Here to Help Life Go Right”
Best Newbie hacker - Books from Big Nerd Ranch and More
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Big Nerd Ranch Prize - Best Newbie Hacker
